roleset.name: resist
roleset.note: RESIST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'resist' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'resistant' based on BOLT-4,5. No Verbnet entry. (from resist.01-v)
RESISTANCE-N NOTES: Roleset based on resist.01. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from resistance.01-n)
RESISTANT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from resistant.01-j)

example.name: resist-v: resistance is futile
example.text: Stocks such as Hershey Foods Corp., Wal-Mart Stores Inc., American International Group Inc. and Federal National Mortgage Association became such bargains that he couldn't resist them, he says.

example.name: resistant-j
example.text: Still , I think that Tokyo is more earthquake - resistant today than it was in 1923 .

example.name: resistance-n: Example with both args
example.text: the government 's resistance to fundamental change

example.name: resistance-n: Another example with both args
